definitions: Take, hold, or deploy (something) as a means of accomplishing a purpose or achieving a result.
Employ (a system, method, or technique) for a particular purpose.
Expend or consume (something) by using it.
Treat (someone or something) in a specified way.
examples: She used a knife to cut the bread.
They use a new software system.
He used up all the sugar.
Don't use me for your own gain.
